features: CRUSADER BATMOBILE PLAYSET: Let your child experience thrilling Gotham City adventures with the Crusader Batmobile! This set includes an exclusive 4-inch Batman action figure and 3 Super-Villain paper figures
CAPTURE SUPER-VILLAINS: Aim the BatHook at the Super-Villain paper figures providing a unique and exciting play experience for kids! Can you capture them?
VILLAIN CONTAINMENT STORAGE: The rear storage unit can hold up to two 4-inch Super-Villain figures, keeping Gotham City safe from the likes of The Joker, King Shark, and Mr. Freeze
EXCLUSIVE BATMAN FIGURE: Set includes an exclusive 4-inch Batman action figure, along with 3 Super-Villain paper figures - The Joker, King Shark and Mr. Freeze!
PERFECT GIFTS FOR KIDS: Encourage imagination and storytelling with Batman toy figures & playsets! Ideal for children who love superhero toys adventures and pretend play!
Includes: 1 Batmobile, 1 Action Figure, 1 Accessory, 3 Paper Figures
Covered by the Spin Master Care Commitment. See below for full details
body.description: Get ready for thrilling Gotham City adventures with the Crusader Batmobile Playset! This incredible playset is designed to be compatible with 4-inch figures, allowing kids to create epic battles and save the city from Super-Villains. The set includes an exclusive 4-inch Batman action figure and three paper villain figures! Use the The Joker, King Shark, and Mr. Freeze paper figures as targets! Can you capture them? The Crusader Batmobile features a unique BatHook launcher, designed to capture Super-Villains on the run! Kids can use their imagination and creativity to launch the BatHook, capturing the bad guys and stopping their evil plans in their tracks. Once the villains are captured, secure them in the rear containment unit of the Batmobile. This playset allows kids to capture up to two 4-inch Super-Villains, ensuring that Gotham City remains safe and secure. The Crusader Batmobile Playset is the perfect gift for Batman fans who love imaginative play and Super Hero action. Expand your child's world of Batman with Metallic Rebirth Batman, Robin, The Joker, and more (each sold separately) DC action figures. These toys for girls and boys toys are perfect for kids that love Justice League figurines, DC multiverse, Super Hero movies collectibles, RC cars, and more! Whether it's a birthday, holiday, or special occasion, this playset will provide hours of fun and entertainment for kids ages 4 and up.

This incredible playset is designed to be compatible with 4-inch figures, allowing kids to create epic battles and save the city from Super-Villains. The set includes an exclusive 4-inch Batman action figure and three paper villain figures! Use the The Joker, King Shark, and Mr. Freeze paper figures as targets! Can you capture them? Aim the BatHook at the Super-Villain paper figures providing a unique and exciting play experience for kids! Can you capture them? reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good price point and large car. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 3 yr old grandson and he was thrilled with it! It’s a good size and has the very fun feature of a grappling hook that shoots out from the hood! All the kids wanted to take turns shooting it and to be honest, so did all of the adults! The toy seems pretty durable. As a car alone, it would be a good toy. But with the shooting projectile, it’s awesome! A definite hit!!!

reviews.reviewText: This Batmobile is so cool and my 4 year old son loves it! It was such a great price and it was bigger than I thought it was going to be. Overall this was such a great gift for my son!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Two nitpicky on this.First, the lesser. Paper villains? Really?Ok so, this can actually be taken as Spinmaster being really cheap, or, hey Spinmaster was cool to add a couple extra villains; even if they are paper/cardboard. One way ids a negative, the other a bit more positive.The second matters to only retailers and collectors. And that is the retail box it comes in. If this is a gift that will be opened by a kid (regardless of age) then it's not a problem. If you are a collector, you already know this has been a problem the past several plus years. Rather than enclosing the entire Batmobile, they leave it open (to collect dust) and impossible to stack; leaving retailers to wonder how to effectively stack a pile of them, and collectors unable to display it properly.To deal with the dust issue, Spinmaster did wrap the Batmobile in plastic, so, that was kind of nice.My sole purpose to even bring this up, is the hopes Hasbro, Mattel, Spinmaster and even McFarlane read these reviews and realize the three pennies they save is annoying to collecters.As far as the Bat mobile itself goes, its not really any kind of a super upgrade from anything we've had in the past decade, really. But, WARNING! it is the first Batmobile that I recall having a projectile since the first Batmobile Mattel produce some 20 years ago. So, please, don't give this to a bratty or clumsy child who will use it as a weapon or hurt themselves.No point in grading paint. Its the usual paint job.Displayability: in box 60/100. Because of all the suffocation warnings, the plastic does not help the display much, but does help with dust control.Fun Factor: 90/100. Its the Batmobile, its fun to play with, of course!Collectibility factor: 85/100. Of course, time and desirability will be the ultimate judge here. Its large, so unless you're me, and can find more spaces in your house to display things, then space will be an issue. But, if you collect Batman, and make room for these things, oh yeah. Who can't live without another Batmobile? I couldn'tRecommendation: 90/100. Especially if you get an excellent price, I recommend this. Even if you don't its still a cool Batmobile.
